title: Spinach soup with chicken meatballs
ingredients: ['1 slice wholemeal bread', '250g chicken mince', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1.5L water', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 potatoes, cubed', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 carrot, cubed', '250g fresh spinach, chopped']
